Interface AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SelectionModule.SelectableItemsAdapter<Item>
    Enclosing class:
    AdapterModule<Adapter extends AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter>

    public static interface AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter

    Interface Overview

    Base interface for "module based" adapter.

    Martin Albedinsky
